title: People With Certain Medical Conditions And Covid-19 Risk Factors
content:
If you have questions
about a condition not included on this list or questions on how to manage your condition and protect yourself from COVID-19 and severe illness.
For treatment options.
You must start treatment within 5-7 days from the time your symptoms start. Treatment can reduce your risk of hospitalization by more than 50% and reduce your risk of death.
You can also visit a
Test to Treat
location.
Conditions that can increase risk
